thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com | 9 of 1174
thread.title: John Gilmore
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by John Gilmore

author: John Gilmore
title: John Gilmore
text: We like to stay in a certain room, and there is no opportunity to give a preference. In the past with phone reservations, where we asked for a certain room, there is no record at the hotel this was asked. The local hotel staff are always very accommodating in meeting requests, but there is nothing in the reservation experience that is customer oriented.
